column5: Heading up to a lodge around Chapleau the end of August and looking for some info on the area. Anybody know what I can expect or specifically has anyone been to or heard of experiences at Kinogami lodge. Thanks guys and Gals Lew

Lenny-- Every year, we fish in a little place called Missanabie--just this way of Chapleau. I've never been to the lodge you mention but I may be able to answer some questions about the general area. Let me know if you have any. We were there in late June this year and did well. Trout
